title: Reorder navigation so Order History appears below My Account

requirements.text: Update the navigation/menu ordering so the "Order History" button appears below the "My Account" button (i.e., directly after it) wherever both items are shown together (especially in the mobile slide-out menu). Keep all user-facing text in English.

quotes: move the order history  button below My Account button

acceptanceCriteria: In the mobile slide-out menu in `frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav.tsx`, the "Order History" button is listed below the "My Account" button (and not above it).
No existing routes or navigation behaviors change ("Order History" still navigates to `/order-history`; "My Account" still opens the account/auth modal).
User-facing labels remain in English (e.g., "My Account", "Order History").

constraints: Do not modify any files under the immutable frontend paths (e.g., `frontend/src/components/ui/*`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x)`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`).
Keep the backend single-actor architecture; no backend changes are required for this UI-only reordering.
nonGoals: Do not change authentication logic or available sign-in methods.
Do not add new routes or new navigation destinations.
Do not redesign the header layout beyond the requested ordering change.
